column2: Orc

This character is an Orc. Orcs are large, brawny greenskins which naturally dominate any smaller greenskins. The boss of a tribe is usually the largest and meanest, but it is not unknown for an unusually cunning or magically-gifted orc to maintain control through other means. Orcs love to fight and win, but are also partial to shouting, drinking and building large ramshackle constructions.
Goblin

This character is a Goblin. Goblins are smaller greenskins, but make up for their size with exceptional cunning. Goblins typically serve as fodder for orc armies, but if a tribe of goblins manages to kill or drive off their orc bosses, they will strike out on their own and attempt to carve out their own domain.
Snotling

This character is a Snotling. Snotlings are small, cowardly and stupid greenskins, possessing a demeanour and intelligence comparable to an eager puppy dog. As such, they naturally follow any orc or goblin which cares to assert authority over them. Snotlings serve their masters happily until they are killed by misadventure, combat or lunch. In battle they wield whatever they can think to grab, such as pointy sticks, bones or large mushrooms, and are usually completely ineffective.
Small Orc
This Orc is downright titchy and should only think about bossing even smaller things, like Squigs and Snotlings.
Average Orc
This Orc is about the size of an Orc, and should follow their boss.
Large Orc
This Orc is large, making them suitable for bossing most Orcs around.
Huge Orc
This Orc is huge, making them the rightful boss of every sensible Orc.
Small Goblin
This Goblin is downright titchy and should only think about bossing even smaller things, like Squigs and Snotlings.
Average Goblin
This Goblin is about the size of an Goblin, and should follow their boss.
Large Goblin
This Goblin is large, making them suitable for bossing most Goblins around.
Huge Goblin
This Goblin is huge, making them the rightful boss of every sensible Goblin.
Black Orc
Black Orcs are the biggest and strongest of all Orcs, and get their name from their dour, grim demeanor as much as from the colour of their skin, which is extremely dark green or black.
Greenskin Shaman
Greenskin Shamans are an unpredictable lot, but their power in battle is undeniable - when those powers work as intended, of course. When not, they can be as dangerous to their own side as the enemy.
Prefers Gork
This Greenskin thinks that Gork is the best of the twin gods, because he's cunningly brutal
Prefers Mork
This Greenskin thinks that Mork is the best of the twin gods, because he's brutally cunning.
Lore of Da Waaagh - §GBattle Magic Pool([This.MagicPool.GetValue]/[This.MagicPoolMax.GetValue])§!

The Greenskins don't channel the Winds of Magic like most other races, instead, their shamans draw power from the Waaagh, a magic field generated unconsciously by all Greenskins. They can manifest this power in all kinds of ways, from strengthening their comrades in battle to summoning the feet of their gods to crush their enemies.\n§GSummons Spell Units during battles§!
Greenskin Control

Greenskins don't have the same concept of ruler as the other races, instead the strong rule over the weak. That is the only Greenskin law.\n Each level of this law will be automatically passed to its next level at 100, 250, 500 and 1000 prestige for each respective level.\n The average time for the next level of the law to be enacted is 1 year, but it can be shortened with certain traits.
No Greenskin Control
The Greenskins of this tribe don't respect your authority at all. Next level at 100.
Low Greenskin Control
The Greenskins now grudgingly respect your authority. Next level at 250.
Medium Greenskin Control
The Greenskins now somewhat respect your authority. Next level at 500.
High Greenskin Control
The Greenskins now respect your authority. Next level at 1000.
Absolute Greenskin Control
The Greenskins now completely respect your authority.
Weak Boss
This Greenskin has been deemed a weak leader by its peers, and must now face their animosity
Preparing WAAAGH!
Attempted WAAAGH!
Defeated Greenskins
This ruler has recently thwarted the attempts of a Greenskin horde to conquer their lands. The Greenskins will not dare to intrude intro this character's demesne for 5 years.
Imposed Greenskin Law
Tagged Recipient

This Greenskin is awaiting for a proper reward to be given to him.

Greenskin Hideouts

While this province's Greenskin population is mostly leaderless and disorganized, they remain a threat, waiting in their hideouts for a chance to pillage and destroy nearby settlements. Marshal of this province's ruler will eventually try to organize an expedition to eradicate them.
Hunting Greenskins
Attempt to exterminate the Greenskins of this province is ongoing. Note if the attempt fails, this might spur the local Greenskins into action.
Greenskins Wrecking
Marauding bands of Greenskins are tearing down buildings and causing general mayhem while colonizing this province.
Greenskin Animostiy
For whatever trivial reason, the Greenskins in this area have started a massive province-wide brawl.
Make land Green

Boyz, let'z make dese 'ere lands green and propa!\n This councillor action will make a province with a Tribal capital eventually get Greenskin Colonization modifiers, which have 2 levels \n After level 2, the event will flip the provinces to [Root.Culture.GetName] culture and [Root.Religion.GetName] religion, and convert all the remaining non-Temple holdings into Tribal holdings
WAAAGH! on [Title.GetBaseName]

Launches the WAAAGH! on the target kingdom. If the war is won, §Y$CLAIMANT$§! will get all the titles inside of it, the provinces conquered will be instantly converted to his culture and religion and their holdings will be converted to tribal ones.
WAAAGH! of [Title.GetBaseName]
WAAAGH! $CLAIMANT$
Greenskin Invasion of [Title.GetBaseName]
Greenskins can attack any neighbouring county even if it is held by fellow Greenskins. §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can also attack any bordering province and occupy them, as far as the boyz can manage.
Invasion of [Title.GetBaseName]
$ORDER$$FIRST_ADJ$ Greenskin Invasion of $OTHER_TITLE$
Greenskin Invasion

Greenskins can attack any neighbouring duchy even if it is held by fellow Greenskins, but only if they have the Medium Greenskin Power law or higher. To reflect their warlike ways, the truce cooldown period is only one year.
Greenskin Invasion of [Title.GetBaseName]
$ORDER$$FIRST_ADJ$ Greenskin Invasion of [Title.GetBaseName]
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can wage war to take any land for his horde.

$ORDER$$FIRST_ADJ$ Greenskin Uprising of $OTHER_TITLE$

Purge the Greenskin pests in [Title.GetBaseName]!

I am da [Root.GetTitle] of dis 'ere tribe, 'an you's do as I say!
Take Greenskin into your clan
Take [Root.GetBestName] into your clan
Dis 'ere boy [Root.GetBestName] wud make da [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] clan stronga!. Note that you can only have a total of 3 adopted heirs, living or dead.
Unite the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] Clans
OI! I'z da biggest, meanest warboss 'dere iz! \nThis decision will upgrade your primary King title into a titular Empire.
Unite the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] Clans
OI! I'z a big bad warboss ya git! \nThis decision will upgrade your primary Duke title into a titular Kingdom.
Declare Waaagh! against [Root.GetBestName]

Declaring a WAAAGH! against a target gives you access to the WAAAGH! Invasion cb against any of the target's de-jure kingdoms.\n During 2 years, hordes of Greenskins will flock to your banner. Not declaring war within two years cancels the invasion and has a heavy Prestige cost. You can only declare WAAAGHs against realms adjacent to yours.
Bash [Root.GetBestName]'s head
I'ma krump dis weak boy boss on 'is head...
Stomp [Root.GetBestName]
We'z da [From.Culture.GetName], and we be bossed by no stinkin' [Root.Culture.GetName]! STOMP HIM!
Challenge da boss!
[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] Iz a squigg-lova 'an a runt, 'an he'z gunna get his 'ead smashed!
Gatha da boyz!
If there'z sum good scrappin' you'z can count on da boyz to fight wit ya...
Make [Root.Location.GetName] Green

Send in da boyz ta make da land green! Note that Greenskin colonization is inherently destructive, and it will destroy all holdings but the capital at the end of the process, which will become a Tribal holding if it isn't already.
Determine Task

Maybe dis 'ere boy deserves a reward....

 ----------------

 To grant titles to a new holder as a Greenskin you need to first tag the selected character through this decision, then right click on the title you wish to give away to complete the process before the assigned modifier tag runs out.
Assign Territory

Establish Greenskin Tribe at [Root.Location.GetName]
OI! Boss! [Root.Location.GetName] looks kinda empty. Maybe we's should have da boyz place sum dung-huts in dis 'ere place?
AI Greenskin decision
AI Greenskin decision
Greenskin god preference

Every Greenskin holds one of their twin gods, Gork and Mork, in higher esteem than the other, which usually causes constant arguments and conflict ( As does everything else for them ) over who's the strongest.
Cleanse Greenskins Presence
The Greenskins have left destruction in their wake on this province. With a little founding you could call for an expedition to eliminate them entirely from the area.
Orc reproduction remains a mystery, but every dynasty needs heirs and these are close kin of yours and will inherit your possessions upon your death.
Orcs and goblins grow in size from the number of battles they have fought in and won. As you have reached the age of adulthood, your size is...
With each victory in battle, you grow a little in size and strength!
Today, your favourite grot dropped your best choppa on his foot when the handle came off...
Ya stupid git ruined ma best choppa!
ZOG IT!!
After doing your daily drops, you notice a goblin attempting to make away with a heavy, double bladed choppa...
Oi! Dat's mine! Git 'im, lads!
Meh, zog it...
Woit... Lessee wher' 'is stash is...
You cunningly tail the goblin back to his stash... As sneakily as an orc can...
After a near un-orc-ish display of cunning brutality, you stand before the goblin's secret stash, a pile of pilfered weaponry which must have taken several goblin generations to collect...
Da's gonna git me a big bag 'o teef...!
Oi'm 'now a few lads who'd loik a gud choppa...
In times of war, it's not uncommon for orc shamans to join a Warboss's retinue, so that they may witness their nascent legend.
Wot? Jus' tell 'im ta stay outta mah way!!
Oi'm not sure 'bout dat... Wot if he makes meeb head splode?
Some goblin told me I could get myself a lot more fungus beer if I planted the fungus on my own personal dropping ground...
Gud Idea, Skumzog!
Wot if we try ta stick you in da ground instead?
The boyz look around all shifty-eyed at the Fungus beer you "cultivate".
Dats it, lads! Drink up! Wot? Don't mind da aftertaste...
Make me wonda... Wot if I use da fungus dowots instead...
Maybe your brews will be liked better if they don't contain rotting goblin...
I recently placated an upstart orc by tanking him full with booze...
Have anuvva, boyz!
I could make me a right gud fungus wine outta dis...
There's nothing more orcish then getting stinking drunk!
Da gobbo's I planted aren't making fer very gud beer...
...But dey look zoggin' nice on me lawn!
Mebbeh I should plant fungus instead...
Since I put Skumzog's head on a stick, no goblin has tried making away with any of my choppas.
If Oi put up more, Oi bet dey won't even shit in me lawn!
Dat's da spirit!
The boyz have been strangely motivated lately...
Dats jus' cuz I'm da best brewer in da camp.
Me' garden showed 'em wots wot!

Dey don't know whoz dey i'z messin' wit! Zogg em!
You'z waited too long ya git. Da boyz dat joined da WAAAGH! don't care 'bout you'z no more and started scrapin' wit each otha! 'Dere goez ur great WAAAGH!, you'z blown it!

A great horde of [Root.Culture.GetName]s haz come to scrap unda your WAAAGH! banna! Dey can't waitz to start krumpin' ur enemies!
We'z gunna stomp 'em good!

He can join, but I'z da boss! we'z gunna zogg 'em good now!
A smalla horde of [Root.Culture.GetName]s wantz to fight unda da WAAAGH! banna! Dey say dey can 'elp ya zogg da gits!
We'z da best, and dey know'z it!

He'z a [Root.Culture.GetName] boss, gud 'n propa!

Dat runt, squigg-lova [From.Culture.GetName] you'z got as ur boss sayz he'z gunna bash ur 'ead for dat! SHOW HIM!
WAAAAAAGH!!

I'm da greatest!
[From.GetFirstName] Haz [From.GetTitledFirstName], one of yer bosses in a krumpin' and taken [From.GetHerHis] place as da boss!
Runtz...

Dere'z a lotta new boyz comin' ta [From.Location.GetName]! All of dem plunderin' and scrappin' the runty huts in'ta propa green camps!

Boyz arrivin' at [From.Location.GetName] were fightin' ova da best spot to place da hut... or ova who would get da biggest squigg herd... whaddeva. Da important bit iz dat da boyz are now scrappin' all ova [From.Location.GetName], and dat'z bad...
OI! YOU! Get back ta work ya git!
so... who'z fo you'z fink is da biggest, baddest god?
Gork is best cuz he'z cunnin' anl' brutal!
Mork is best cuz he'z brutal an' cunnin'!
Da boyz of da [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] Tribe iz sartin' to respekt ya in da propa way!
Dey betta be or i'll krump 'em!

[Root.Culture.GetName] [Root.Culture.GetName] [Root.Culture.GetName] [Root.Culture.GetName]
Da boyz of da [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] Tribe now really really respekt ya!
I'm da greenist, an' I'm da meanest!
Da boyz of da [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] tribe tink you'z da biggest, meaniest, greeniest [Root.Culture.GetName] 'dere is!!
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] iz wiv' me!!
Da boyz of da [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] Tribe 'ave lost all respekt for ya!
Da boyz of da [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] Tribe 'ave lost all respekt for ya, but still fearz ya choppa!
Da boyz of da [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] Tribe no longa tinks you'z da baddest, but still respekt ya in da propa way!
Da boyz of da [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] Tribe no longa tinks you'z da meanest, but still respekt ya in da propa way!
I'm gunna zogg deez gits!
You'z got zogged in da duel ya git! None of da boyz iz gunna listen to you'z now!
I could still krump dem boyz...
All da otha boyz iz lookin' at you'z funny. You'z a weak boss now! Meaner an' greener bosses may try to krump you'z and take ova da clan...
Dem boyz don't got'z what it takez! I'll zogg 'em any time!
Da otha boyz iz startin' to laugh at ya, dey sayz you'z a weak git an' not a propa orc warboss...
OI! Dey iz da gits, I'll zogg dem nice and good!
OI! Boss! Da boyz in [From.Location.GetName] iz chantin' an' plunderin' in yer name! Dis land belongs to da [Root.Culture.GetName]s!
I'm da gratest [Root.Culture.GetName] der iz!
OI! Boss! Dis 'ere land of [From.Location.GetName] haz been made green by da boyz! We knocked down der buildin's an' put up some propa orc onez! Da boyz iz all chantin' an' plunderin' in yer name!
OI! Boss! While plunderin' da boyz found a bigg droppin' in [From.Location.GetName] wiv da face ov [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] in it! [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] favaas you'z!
Some of da new boyz comin' ta [Root.Location.GetName] 'ave come to yer camp, hopin' dat you'z can lead 'em to a propa scrap!

Dis 'ere land of [Root.Location.GetName] haz been made green by da boyz! We knocked down der buildin's an put up some propa orc onez! A small band ov boyz 'as come to yer camp, 'opin dat you'z lead 'em to a propa scrap!
A small band ov boyz 'as come to [Root.Location.GetName], 'opin dat you'z lead 'em to a propa scrap!
Come 'ere boyz! We'z gonna get really mean!
OI! Boss! A small band ov boyz 'as come to [From.Location.GetName], 'opin dat you'z lead 'em to a propa scrap!

Dis 'ere land of [From.Location.GetName] haz been made green by da boyz! We knocked down der buildin's an put up some propa orc onez! A small band ov boyz 'as come to yer camp, 'opin dat youz lead 'em to a propa scrap!
OI! Boss! A small band ov boyz 'as come to [From.Location.GetName], 'opin dat you lead 'em to a propa scrap!
Come 'ere boyz! We'z gonna get really mean!
The province is colonized and your prestige augments!
The province is colonized and a small band of boyz arrives!
WAAAAGH!
OI! [Root.GetTitle]! [Root.GetTitle]! One of dem big n' mean Black Orcs has waltzed into yer camp! He sez he wants ta stomp ya an' rule your boyz as da new [Root.GetTitle] in da proppa way!
I'll show em! WAAAAGH!
OI! Boss! All da boyz in [Root.GetName] are startin' to drezz an' yap jus' like ya!
Datz more like it, boyz!
Da ova boyz are startin' to laugh at ya, dey say you'z a weak snotling cause you haven't been in a propa scrap fer too long...
OI! I'll show dose runtz!

It seems that the province of [Root.GetName] was in the process of being colonized by the Greenskin races, in their particular way. We have managed to eliminate most of them, but some stragglers remain, and cause some trouble until they disperse.
Damn these Greenskins!
Fall of [From.Kingdom.GetName]

The Greenskins are a quarrelsome race. If not under the leadership of a strong leader, one that leads them to further battles against other races, they will degenerate into infighting. The [From.Kingdom.GetFullName] has been under such a weak leader, and now pays the price.

Left unchecked, the bosses of the tribes that made up the horde of the [From.Kingdom.GetFullName] have degenerated into animosity and petty clan warfare.

The [From.Kingdom.GetFullName] has collapsed entirely.
Collapse of [From.Empire.GetName]

The Greenskins are a quarrelsome race. If not under the leadership of a strong leader, one that leads them to further battles against other races, they will degenerate into infighting. The [From.Empire.GetFullName] has been under such a weak leader, and now pays the price.

Left unchecked, the bosses of the tribes that made up the horde of the [From.Empire.GetFullName] have degenerated into animosity and petty clan warfare.

The [From.Empire.GetFullName] has collapsed entirely.
Hooray!
Runtz...

A dangerous horde of Greenskins has reached [Root.GetName]! A strong Warboss has rallied all the Greenskins hiding in your lands, and some other coming from nearby places, with the aim of overcoming out defences, looting and pillaging the province!
Cursed creatures!

A dangerous horde of Greenskins has reached [From.GetName]! A strong Warboss has rallied all the Greenskins hiding in your lands, and some other coming from nearby places, with the aim of overcoming out defences, looting and pillaging the province!
Cursed creatures!
Da uvver boyz are startin' to laugh at ya, dey say you'z a squig-brain no longer a propa gobbo warboss...
OI! I'll show dis runtz!

A dangerous horde of Greenskins has reached [Root.GetName]! A strong Warboss has rallied all the Greenskins hiding in your lands, and some other coming from nearby places, with the aim of overcoming out defenses, looting and pillaging the province!

News have reached you that [From.GetTitledFirstName] has started preparing a great WAAAGH! against [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Hordes and hordes of barbaric Greenskins are already flocking under [From.GetHerHis] banner.
We must be prepared!.
This province is infested by a massive Greenskin population. It is only right that your liege funds an expedition to cleanse it from these troublesome pests.
I will plead for it at once.
The land of [From.Location.GetName] is infested by a massive Greenskin population. Your subjects have pleaded many times for you to fund an expedition to exterminate them.
Sounds reasonable.
We cannot spare anything for this.
Your expedition did their job and exterminated every last one of the Greenskin pests still marauding in your land.
Good.

The expedition had catastrophic results: not only the Greenskins repelled your forces, the battle has stirred them into a bloodlust, and now, if they gain further momentum, they might band into a full horde.
We must be prepared!
Da new boyz comin' ta [From.Location.GetName] are chantin', plunderin' and raising da [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] banner all frough da place! Dis land belongs to da [Root.Culture.GetName]s!
I'm da greatest [Root.Culture.GetName] theres!
Dis 'ere land of [Root.Location.GetName] has been made green by da boys! Now, all da fawmer 'oldings built by runtz are rebuilt in da propa way!
Da boys 'ave found a droppin' in [Root.Location.GetName] wiv da face ov [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] in it! [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] favaaahrs us!
Any holding in any of your demesne's province is not a Tribe

The capital holding of all the provinces in your demesne will be converted into a Tribal holding ( Except if it is a Temple ).\n This will enable you to use the Make land Green job action and colonize the province with Greenskins.

You can upgrade your Greenskin Control law level right now instead of waiting for it, but it will cost you that levels respective prestige requirement ( 100, 250, 500 or 1000 ).\n For trying to impose this change, a Greenskin of your same race and of higher stature will challenge you to a duel, if you lose or escape, the Greenskin Control law will return to its previous level
[Root.GetBestName] must not belong to any other clan.\n
You need to hold at least 2 Duke tier titles.\n
You need to hold at least 2 King tier titles.\n
You will be given a King-tier titular version of your main Duke tier title.\n
You will be given an Emperor-tier titular version of your main King tier title.\n
This will also give you the option to declare Waaaghs! on other King-tier and above, non-Greenskin characters.\n

You will gain all the de-jure, held titles under the target Kingdom, and execute their holder(s).\n All the provinces within the target de-jure Kingdom will be converted to your culture and religion, and their holdings converted to tribal holdings.
Greenskins will start arriving at [Root.Location.GetName]. Note that Greenskins are an unpredictable bunch, so the result might not always be positive...

The Greenskins in this province will be purged. It will convert to your religion and culture, and any tribal holdings will converted to those that correspond your government type, but some Greenskins will persist in the province for at least 10 years.\n
Warband

Greenskin groups like to call themselves in many flashy ways: Tribes, Klans, Mobz, Warbands... in the end, they all amount to the same, a group of warlike individuals kept together by the biggest and strongest Greenskin specimen around, who will often get his position challenged, and himself killed if not strong enough to defend it. Greenskins don't have a concept of law beyond strength, and thus ignore the De Jure laws of any realm. They can also freely revoke the titles of any non-Greenskin vassal.
Orc Freebootaz

Freebootaz are Greenskins that have either built a ramshackle ship of some kind or have managed to get their hands on a sailing vessel and have taken to the sea, where they raid and loot and pillage as their kind is want to.
Waaagh! [Root.GetName]
You will challenge [Root.GetBestName] to a duel. If you win, the Weak Warboss modifier will be removed from you.
[Root.County.GetAdjective] Orc Horde
[Root.County.GetAdjective] Goblin Horde
[Root.County.GetAdjective] Forest Goblin Horde
[Root.County.GetAdjective] Night Goblin Horde
[Root.County.GetAdjective] Savage Orc Horde
Greenskins don't get levies or taxes fron any non-Tribal holding.
